content.text: Koshin is an unseen character from Oda's one-shot Ikki Yako.
He was Guko's master and a friend of the Guardian Deity. He was killed by Hitokui before the events of the story.
As a Monk he should have been fearless, and willing to help people.
At some point, he took Guko under his wing and became Guko's teacher. He was friends with the Guardian Deity, and one day went into the woods to fight a monster.
Little did he know that monster would end Koshin's life, and steal his clothes. Guko avenged Koshin's death, and killed the Hitokui.
